titles.title: 577 Where is The School For Each And All (easy nic

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Where is the school
For each and all
Where men become
As children small
And little ones are great

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Where love is all
The task and rule
The fee our all
And all at school
Small poor of low estate

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Where to unlearn
All things I learn
From self and
From all others turn
One Master hear and see

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
I learn and do
One thing alone
And wholly give
Myself to One
Who gives
Himself to me

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
My task possessing
Nought to give
No life to have
Yet ever live
And ever losing gain

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
To follow
Knowing not the way
If He shall call
To answer
"Yea-all hail
All shame and pain"

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Where silent
In His Holy Place
I look enraptured
On His Face
In glory undefiled

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
And know the
Heaven of His kiss
The doing nought
The simple bliss
Of being but a child

verse.name: v5a
verse.lines:
Where find the school
To men unknown
Where time and place
Are past and gone
The hour is ever now

verse.name: v5b
verse.lines:
O soul
Thou needest ask no more
God tells thee
Of His open door
Still come
And harken thou
